Name: wind turbine construction, 2.3MW, precast concrete tower, onshore | wind turbine, 2.3MW, onshore | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/28:Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c./281:Manufacture of general-purpose machinery/2811:Manufacture of engines and turbines, except aircraft, vehicle and cycle eng
Description: The Enercon E82-2.3 MW turbine is chosen as reference technology.;Characteristics: ; - Capacity: 2300 kW ;- Diameter of the rotor: 82 m; - Number of rotor blades: 3; - rotor blade weight: 7300 kg; - nacelle weight: 132000 kg; ; - tower type: modular concrete and steel towerr;- tower weight: 727000 kg; - material of the tower: Steel and concrete; - foundation weight: 746000; - Lifetime: 20 years;;Source: data collection and Enercon (http://www.enercon.de/p/downloads/EN_Productoverview_0710.pdf) ;;Further characteristics:;;Operational data;Rated power: 2,300 kW;Cut-in wind speed: 2 m/s;Rated wind speed: 16 m/s;Cut-out wind speed: 28 - 34 m/s;Wind class: IEC/NVN IIA;;Rotor;Rotor diameter: 82 m;Swept area: 5,281 m2;Nominal revolutions: 16.7 rpm;Operational interval: 6-18 rpm;Generator: ENERCON direct-drive annular ;generator;Main bearing: Double-row tapered / cylindrical roller bearingsBrake systems: (1)3 independent pitch control systems with emergency power supply; (2) Rotor brake; (3)Rotor lock;;Source: Enercon, 2010, ENERCON Wind energy converters
